code: import api from"./api";export var ACTION_TYPES={FETCHDVDATA:"FECTHDVDATA",GET:"GET"};export var fetch=function fetch(){return function(dispatch){api.CountryStats().get().then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.GET,payload:response.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var fetchDvData=function fetchDvData(){return function(dispatch){api.CountryStats().fetch().then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.FETCHDVDATA,payload:response.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
